Well I can hear them just fine. Bless her heart hehehe.
   
  I always wondered if I didnt believe in it would I have gotten my first evp. Tho it was an accident I still KNEW it was possible that evp could be recorded and had heard some others results over the years I just never realized that "I" could get them anywhere if I tried. I just thought ya had to be someplace "haunted" so that was my first bubble burst =) Ive had to rethink quite a few things. I realize now that theres no need to hunt for ghosts they hunt for me instead.
   
  Misty
  
Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
           Almost like listening to a few people talking amongst themselves. It has been doing htose light snows here during ht eweek, the ones that don't stick around. Margret and David are relatives on my mother's side, that's about I know about them. It would great if my mother could hear, but she don't, and she don't believe. 
 
 
 Frank-S
